alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:54AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene County through 330 AM CDT... At 252 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from near Bolivar to near Everton to near Miller. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield... Republic... Battlefield... Willard... Strafford... Ash Grove... Fair Grove... Walnut Grove... Brookline... Sacville... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... Turners... Bois D`arc... Cave Springs... Galloway... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 59 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
